  \spellcardqr{\urlsecondary}
  %
  % SPELL DESCRIPTION BEGIN
  \emph{Protection from energy} grants temporary immunity to the type of energy you specify when you cast it
  (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic).
  When the spell absorbs 12 points per caster level of energy damage
  (to a maximum of 120 points at 10\textsuperscript{th} level), it is discharged.

  \emph{Protection from energy} overlaps with \emph{resist energy}:
  If a character is warded by both \emph{protection from energy} and \emph{resist energy},
  the \emph{protection} spell absorbs damage until its power is exhausted.
  % SPELL DESCRIPTION END
  %
